downloadTitle: Architecture approaches for Microsoft 365 cloud tenant-to-tenant migrations
downloadDescription: Get planning guidance on several architectural approaches for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and other scenarios that might lead you to migrate to a new Microsoft 365 tenant.
detailsSection: Get planning guidance on several architectural approaches for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and other scenarios that might lead you to migrate to a new Microsoft 365 tenant.
systemRequirementsSection: The ability to read PDF files
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this file to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
